# maskAmountWillChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the cell when its mask amount is about to change.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func maskAmountWillChange(_ nextMaskAmount: CGFloat)
```

## Discussion

## Managing Cell Mask

- **maskAmountDidChange()**: Notifies the cell when its mask amount changes.
